org.apache.ignite.configuration

Class ExecutorConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.ignite.configuration.ExecutorConfiguration

  • public class ExecutorConfiguration
extends Object
    Custom thread pool configuration for compute tasks. See IgniteCompute.withAsync() for more information.

      • setName

        public ExecutorConfiguration setName(String name)
        Set thread pool name. Name cannot be null and should be unique with respect to other custom executors.
        Parameters:
        name - Executor name.
        Returns:
        this for chaining.

      • getSize

        public int getSize()
        Get thread pool size.

        See setSize(int) for more information.

        Returns:
        Thread pool size.

      • setSize

        public ExecutorConfiguration setSize(int size)
        Set thread pool size.

        Defaults to IgniteConfiguration.DFLT_PUBLIC_THREAD_CNT.

        Parameters:
        size - Thread pool size.
        Returns:
        this for chaining.
